# Frequency Tables

## Setup

#### Load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(descr)
library(janitor)
```

#### data

```{r}
# mtcars
data(mtcars)
```

#### variables

```{r}
names(mtcars)
```

## Frequencies

```{r}
tabyl(mtcars, cyl)
```

```{r}
freq(as.ordered(mtcars$cyl), plot = FALSE)
```

```{r}
cars_table <- freq(as.ordered(mtcars$cyl), plot = FALSE)
```
